<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	in the case of a constructive, compromised, agreed or arranged total loss of the Ship, the earliest of:
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:144PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	(i)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	the date on which a notice of abandonment is given to the insurers; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:144PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	(ii)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	the date of any compromise, arrangement or agreement made by or on behalf of the Borrower with the Ship&#8217;s insurers in which the insurers agree to treat the Ship as a total loss; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:96PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	in the case of any other type of total loss, on the date (or the most likely date) on which it appears to the Agent that the event constituting the total loss occurred;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Transfer Certificate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; has the meaning given in Clause 27.2;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Transferee Lender
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; has the meaning given in Clause 27.2;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Transferor Lender
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; has the meaning given in Clause 27.2;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	UCC
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; means the Uniform Commercial Code of the State of New York; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Voting Stock
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; of any person as of any date means the Equity Interests of such person that are at the time entitled to vote in the election of the board of directors or similar governing body of such person.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	1.2
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Construction of certain terms.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;&#32;In this Agreement:
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	approved
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; means, for the purposes of Clause 13, approved in writing by the Agent with the consent of the Lenders;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	asset
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; includes every kind of property, asset, interest or right, including any present, future or contingent right to any revenues or other payment;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; includes any corporation, limited liability company, partnership, joint venture, unincorporated association, joint stock company and trust;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	consent
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; includes an authorization, consent, approval, resolution, license, exemption, filing, registration, notarization and legalization;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	contingent liability
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; means a liability which is not certain to arise and/or the amount of which remains unascertained;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	document
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; includes a deed; also a letter, Email or fax;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	excess risks
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; means, in relation to the Ship, the proportion (if any) of claims for general average, salvage and salvage charges not recoverable under the hull and machinery insurances in respect of the Ship in consequence of the value at which the Ship is assessed for the purpose of such claims exceeding its insured value;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	excess war risk P&amp;I cover
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; means, in relation to the Ship, cover for claims only in excess of amounts recoverable under the usual war risk cover including (but not limited to) hull and machinery, crew and protection and indemnity risks;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	expense
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; means any kind of cost, charge or expense (including all legal costs, charges and expenses) and any applicable value added or other tax;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	law
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; includes any order or decree, any form of delegated legislation, any treaty or international convention and any statute, regulation or resolution of the United States of America, any state thereof, the Council of the European Union, the European Commission, the United Nations or its Security Council or any other Pertinent Jurisdiction;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	legal or administrative action
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; means any legal proceeding or arbitration and any administrative or regulatory action or investigation;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	liability
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; includes every kind of debt or liability (present or future, certain or contingent), whether incurred as principal or surety or otherwise;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	months
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; shall be construed in accordance with Clause 1.3;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	obligatory insurances
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; means, in relation to the Ship, all insurances effected, or which the Borrower is obliged to effect, under Clause 13 or any other provision of this Agreement or another Finance Document;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	parent company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; has the meaning given in Clause 1.4;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	person
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; includes natural persons; any company; any state, political sub-division of a state and local or municipal authority; and any international organization;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	policy
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;, in relation to any insurance, includes a slip, cover note, certificate of entry or other document evidencing the contract of insurance or its terms;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	protection and indemnity risks
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; means the usual risks covered by a protection and indemnity association that is a member of the International Group of P&amp;I Clubs, including pollution risks and the proportion (if any) of any sums payable to any other person or persons in case of collision which are not recoverable under the hull and machinery policies by reason of the incorporation in them of clause 6 of the International Time Clauses (Hulls)(1/11/02 or 1/11/03) or clause 8 of the Institute Time Clauses (Hulls) (1/10/83) or the Institute Amended Running Down Clause (1/10/71) or any equivalent provision;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	regulation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; includes any regulation, rule, official directive, request or guideline (either having the force of law or compliance with which is reasonable in the ordinary course of business of the party concerned) of any governmental body, intergovernmental or supranational, agency, department or regulatory, self&#8209;regulatory or other authority or organization;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	subsidiary
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; has the meaning given in Clause 1.4;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	successor
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; includes any person who is entitled (by assignment, novation, merger or otherwise) to any other person&#8217;s rights under this Agreement or any other Finance Document (or any interest in those rights) or who, as administrator, liquidator or otherwise, is entitled to exercise those rights; and in particular references to a successor include a person to whom those rights (or any interest in those rights) are transferred or pass as a result of a merger, division, reconstruction or other reorganization of it or any other person;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	tax
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; includes any present or future tax, duty, impost, levy or charge of any kind which is imposed by any country, any state, any political sub-division of a state or any local or municipal authority or any other governmental authority authorized to levy such tax (including any such imposed in connection with exchange controls), and any related penalties, interest or fines; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	war risks
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; includes the risk of mines and all risks excluded by clause 29 of the Institute Hull Clauses (1/11/02 or 1/11/03) or clause 24 of the Institute Time clauses (Hulls) (1/11/1995) or clause 23 of the Institute Time Clauses (Hulls) (1/10/83).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	1.3
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Meaning of &#8220;month&#8221;.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;&#32;A period of one or more &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	months
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; ends on the day in the relevant calendar month numerically corresponding to the day of the calendar month on which the period started (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	the numerically corresponding day
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;), but:
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	on the Business Day following the numerically corresponding day if the numerically corresponding day is not a Business Day or, if there is no later Business Day in the same calendar month, on the Business Day preceding the numerically corresponding day; or
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	on the last Business Day in the relevant calendar month, if the period started on the last Business Day in a calendar month or if the last calendar month of the period has no numerically corresponding day,
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	and &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	month
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; and &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	monthly
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; shall be construed accordingly.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	1.4
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Meaning of &#8220;subsidiary&#8221;.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;&#32;A company (S) is a subsidiary of another company (P) if:
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	a majority of the issued Equity Interests in S (or a majority of the issued Equity Interests in S which carry unlimited rights to capital and income distributions) are directly owned by P or are indirectly attributable to P; or
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	P has direct or indirect control over a majority of the voting rights attaching to the issued Equity Interests of S; or
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	P has the direct or indirect power to appoint or remove a majority of the directors (or equivalent) of S; or
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	P otherwise has the direct or indirect power to ensure that the affairs of S are conducted in accordance with the wishes of P;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	and any company of which S is a subsidiary is a parent company of S.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	1.5
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	General interpretation.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;&#32;In this Agreement:
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	references to, or to a provision of, a Finance Document or any other document are references to it as amended, restated or supplemented, whether before the date of this Agreement or otherwise;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	references in Clause 1.1 to a document being in the form of a particular Appendix include references to that form with any modifications to that form which the Agent approves or reasonably requires with the consent of the Lenders and which are acceptable to the Borrower;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	references to, or to a provision of, any law or regulation include any amendment, extension, re-enactment or replacement, whether made before the date of this Agreement or otherwise;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	words denoting the singular number shall include the plural and vice versa; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
	(e)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Clauses 1.1 to 1.5 apply unless the contrary intention appears.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	1.6
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Headings.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;&#32;In interpreting a Finance Document or any provision of a Finance Document, all clause, sub-clause and other headings in that and any other Finance Document shall be entirely disregarded.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	1.7
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Accounting terms
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. Unless otherwise specified herein, all accounting terms used in this Agreement and in the other Finance Documents shall be interpreted, and all financial statements and certificates and reports as to financial matters required to be delivered to any Creditor Party under this Agreement shall be prepared, in accordance with GAAP as from time to time in effect.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	1.8
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Inferences regarding materiality
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. To the extent that any representation, warranty, covenant or other undertaking of a Security Party in this Agreement or any other Finance Document is qualified by reference to those matters which are not reasonably expected to result in a &#8220;material adverse effect&#8221; or language of similar import, no inference shall be drawn therefrom that any Creditor Party has knowledge or approves of any noncompliance by such Security Party with any law or regulation.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	1.9
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Inconsistency between Loan Agreement provisions and the Finance Documents.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#160; The Finance Documents shall be read together with this Loan Agreement, but in case of any conflict between this Loan Agreement and any of the Finance Documents, the provisions of this Loan Agreement shall prevail,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	provided that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;the Finance Documents shall always be governed by the applicable law as described therein.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:24PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-INDENT:-48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	FACILITY
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	2.1
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Amount of facility.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;&#32;Subject to the other provisions of this Agreement, the Lenders severally agree to make available to the Borrower a secured term loan facility in the principal amount of up to the lesser of $21,500,000 and 70% of the Fair Market Value of the Ship, as determined per Schedule 4, Part B(5).
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	2.2
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Lenders&#8217; participations in the Advance.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;&#32;Subject to the other provisions of this Agreement, each Lender shall participate in the Advance in the proportion which, as at the Drawdown Date, its Commitment bears to the Total Commitments.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	2.3
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Purpose of the Advance.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;&#32;The Borrower undertakes with each Creditor Party to use the Advance only to partially finance the acquisition of the Ship.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	2.4
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Cancellation of Total Commitments.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Any portion of the Total Commitments not disbursed to the Borrower shall be cancelled and terminated automatically on the earlier of the Drawdown Date and the expiration of the applicable Availability Period for such Commitment.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	3
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-INDENT:-48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	POSITION OF THE LENDERS
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	3.1
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Interests several.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;&#32;The rights of the Lenders under this Agreement are several.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	3.2
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Individual right of action.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;&#32;Each Lender shall be entitled to sue for any amount which has become due and payable by a Security Party to it under this Agreement without joining the Agent, the Security Trustee or any other Lender as additional parties in the proceedings.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	3.3
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Proceedings requiring Lender consent.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;&#32;Except as provided in Clause 3.2, no Lender may commence proceedings against any Security Party in connection with a Finance Document without the prior consent of the Lenders.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	3.4
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Obligations several.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;&#32;The obligations of the Lenders under this Agreement are several; and a failure of a Lender to perform its obligations under this Agreement shall not result in:
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	the obligations of the other Lenders being increased; nor
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	any Security Party or any other Lender being discharged (in whole or in part) from its obligations under any Finance Document,
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	and in no circumstances shall a Lender have any responsibility for a failure of another Lender to perform its obligations under this Agreement.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	3.5
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Replacement of a Lender.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	If at any time:
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:96PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
	(i)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	any Lender becomes a Non-Consenting Lender (as defined in paragraph (c) below); or
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:96PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
	(ii)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	the Borrower or any other Security Party becomes obliged in the absence of an Event of Default to repay any amount in accordance with Clause 24 or to pay additional amounts pursuant to Clause 23 or Clause 25 to any Lender in excess of amounts payable to other Lenders generally,
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	then the Borrower may, on 30 Business Days&#8217; prior written notice to the Agent and such Lender, replace such Lender by requiring such Lender to (and such Lender shall) transfer pursuant to Clause 27 all (and not part only) of its rights and obligations under this Agreement to a Lender or other bank, financial institution, trust, fund or other entity (a &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Replacement Lender
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;) selected by the Borrower, which is acceptable to the Agent with the consent of the Lenders (other than the Lender the Borrower desires to replace), which confirms its willingness to assume and by its execution of a Transfer Certificate does assume all the obligations of the transferring Lender (including the assumption of the transferring Lender&#8217;s participations on the same basis as the transferring Lender) for a purchase price in cash payable at the time of transfer equal to the outstanding principal amount of such Lender&#8217;s participation in the outstanding Advance and all accrued interest and/or breakages costs and other amounts payable in relation thereto under the Finance Documents.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	The replacement of a Lender pursuant to this Clause 3.5 shall be subject to the following conditions:
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:96PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
	(i)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	the Borrower shall have no right to replace the Agent or the Security Trustee;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:96PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
	(ii)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	neither the Agent nor any Lender shall have any obligation to the Borrower to find a Replacement Lender;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:96PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
	(iii)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	in the event of a replacement of a Non-Consenting Lender such replacement must take place no later than 30 days after the date the Borrower notifies the Non-Consenting Lender and the Agent of its intent to replace the Non-Consenting Lender pursuant to Clause 3.5(a); and
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:96PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
	(iv)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	in no event shall the Lender replaced under this paragraph (b) be required to pay or surrender to such Replacement Lender any of the fees received by such Lender pursuant to the Finance Documents.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	For purposes of this Clause 3.5, in the event that:
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:96PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
	(i)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	the Borrower or the Agent has requested the Lenders to give a consent in relation to or to agree to a waiver or amendment of any provisions of the Finance Documents;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:96PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
	(ii)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	the consent, waiver or amendment in question requires the approval of all Lenders; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:96PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
	(iii)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Lenders whose Commitments aggregate more than 66.67% percent of the Total Commitments have consented to or agreed to such waiver or amendment,
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	then any Lender who does not and continues not to consent or agree to such waiver or amendment shall be deemed a &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Non-Consenting Lender
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	4
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-INDENT:-48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	DRAWDOWN
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	4.1
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Request for Advance.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;&#32;Subject to the following conditions, the Borrower may request the Advance to be made by delivering to the Agent a completed Drawdown Notice not later than 10:00 a.m. (New York City time) two (2) Business Days prior to the intended Drawdown Date.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	4.2
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Availability.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;&#32;The conditions referred to in Clause 4.1 are that:
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
	(f)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	the Drawdown Date must be a Business Day during the Availability Period;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
	(g)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	there shall be no more than one Advance for the Ship;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
	(h)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	the amount of the Advance shall not exceed the lesser of $21,500,000 and 70% of the Fair Market Value of the Ship;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
	(i)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	the applicable conditions precedent stated in Clause 9 hereof shall have been satisfied or waived as provided therein.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	4.3
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Notification to Lenders of receipt of Drawdown Notice.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;&#32;The Agent shall promptly notify the Lenders that it has received a Drawdown Notice and shall inform each Lender of:
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	the amount of the Advance requested and the Drawdown Date;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	the amount of that Lender&#8217;s participation in such Advance; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
	(e)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	the duration of the first Interest Period.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	4.4
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Drawdown Notice irrevocable.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;&#32;A Drawdown Notice must be signed by a director, an officer or a duly authorized attorney-in-fact of the Borrower and once served, a Drawdown Notice cannot be revoked without the prior consent of the Agent.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	4.5
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Lenders to make available Contributions.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;&#32;Subject to the provisions of this Agreement, each Lender shall, before 10:00 a.m. (New York City time) on and with value on the Drawdown Date, make available to the Agent for the account of the Borrower the amount due from that Lender under Clause 2.2.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	4.6
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Disbursement of Advance.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;&#32;Subject to the provisions of this Agreement, the Agent shall on the Drawdown Date pay to the Borrower the amounts which the Agent receives from the Lenders under Clause 4.5 and that payment to the Borrower shall be made:
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	to the account which the Borrower specifies in the Drawdown Notice; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	in the like funds as the Agent received the payments from the Lenders.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	4.7
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Disbursement of Advance to third party.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;&#32;The payment by the Agent under Clause 4.6 to the account of a third party designated by the Borrower in a Drawdown Notice shall constitute the making of the Advance and the Borrower shall at that time become indebted, as principal and direct obligor, to each Lender in an amount equal to that Lender&#8217;s Contribution.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	4.8
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Promissory note.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
